actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Clear Air Act to eliminate, with respect to sulfur dioxide emissions, the best available control technology requirement for anthracite coal-burning facilities.

summary.text: Amends the Clean Air Act to exempt anthracite coal-burning facilities, with respect to sulfur dioxide emissions, from enforcement regulations promulgated by the Administrator of the Environmental Protection Agency and from the requirement that such facilities be subject to the best available technology for the control of sulfur dioxide emissions.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Clear Air Act to eliminate, with respect to sulfur dioxide emissions, the best available control technology requirement for anthracite coal-burning facilities.
